ygData.subject: Re: On possible twinking, with language info
ygData.msgSnippet: I regret that at the time I was doing this, talking between you both, while both nearly identical in skill, causes only wasted bandwith.  The changes aren t
ygData.messageBody:
I regret that at the time I was doing this, talking between you both, while
both nearly identical in skill, causes only wasted bandwith. The changes
aren't apparent until someone zones, a bug that needs fixing. that is the
reason for the zoning. Without the changes being registered, you are still
not technically as good as your partner, therefore you talking to him does no
good. Maybe they fixed that bug, as I have retired from teaching a few days
ago.
Zaeq, mostly boozer, E'ci
